name: G-Coil
description:
Made for the Artic Game Jam (New Year). G-Coil is a Shooter game where you move by shooting. Dodge incoming enemies and shoot them down with your laser!

How to play

* Left mouse click to shoot laser.

* Use the laser recoil to move around.

* Destroying enemies with laser to get points.

* Don't touch anything or you will die.

Have fun! :D

Credits

  • BGM: Ascent to the Station - Synthwave - Royalty Free Music By
    TeknoAXE's Royalty Free Music.
  • Laser SFX: Sci-Fi Force Field Impact 15 by StormwaveAudio
  • Explosion SFX: Groovy's Retro Sound Effects by GroovyMaster
